definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: I can explain it best by something which Mahatma Gandhi said to me.
sentences.chinese: 圣雄甘地曾经过我说过的话可以帮助大家理解它。

sentences.english: Mohandas Gandhi was the twentieth century’s most famous advocate of nonviolent politics.
sentences.chinese: 圣雄甘地是二十世纪最有名的非暴力政治的倡导者。

sentences.english: The woman is obviously perplexed and musters up her courage, and says, "Mahatma, thank you very much.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人很困惑，她鼓起勇气，说“圣雄，非常感谢。

sentences.english: An artist in the show had included a quotation from Mohandas Gandhi.
sentences.chinese: 在演出的艺术家包括了从圣雄甘地的报价。

definition: Gore (name)/Al Gore (1948-), US vice-president 1993-2001 under Bill Clinton, subsequently environmental campaigner and Nobel Peace laureate
Nelson Mandela (1918-2013), South African ANC politician, president of South Africa 1994-1999
Jawaharlal Nehru (1889-1964), Indian politician, first prime minister 1947-1964
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
father or founder of a nation/Father of the Republic (Sun Yat-sen)
